summary: Fixed 404 error for booking conversation endpoint. Problem: Bookings created via seed script didn't have conversation_id. Solution: Created script to generate conversations for all bookings without conversation_id. Script creates UserInfo records for users and vendors if missing, then creates conversations between them. All 3 bookings now have conversation_id. Also documented Firebase OAuth warning (non-critical, only affects OAuth popup/redirect). Other console errors (Token missing, Firebase messaging permission) are expected/non-critical.
